detectors.description:
UniLayer.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UniLayer.sol#166-176) can write the state variable array at will
	Dangerous write operations:
	- _gonBalances[to] = _gonBalances[to].add(gonValue) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UniLayer.sol#173)

detectors.description:
owner() should be declared external:
	- Ownable.owner() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UniLayer.sol#64-66)

renounceOwnership() should be declared external:
	- Ownable.renounceOwnership() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UniLayer.sol#73-76)

transferOwnership(address) should be declared external:
	- Ownable.transferOwnership(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UniLayer.sol#78-82)

totalSupply() should be declared external:
	- UniLayer.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UniLayer.sol#150-156)

balanceOf(address) should be declared external:
	- UniLayer.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UniLayer.sol#158-164)

transfer(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- UniLayer.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UniLayer.sol#166-176)

allowance(address,address) should be declared external:
	- UniLayer.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UniLayer.sol#178-184)

transferFrom(address,address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- UniLayer.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UniLayer.sol#186-199)

approve(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- UniLayer.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UniLayer.sol#201-208)

increaseAllowance(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- UniLayer.increaseAllowance(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UniLayer.sol#210-218)

decreaseAllowance(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- UniLayer.decreaseAllowance(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UniLayer.sol#220-232)
private constant DECIMALS = 18; (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UniLayer.sol)#103
private constant MAX_UINT256 = ~uint256(0); (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UniLayer.sol)#104
private constant INITIAL_FRAGMENTS_SUPPLY = 40000000 * 10**DECIMALS; (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UniLayer.sol)#105
private constant TOTAL_GONS = MAX_UINT256 - (MAX_UINT256 % INITIAL_FRAGMENTS_SUPPLY); (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UniLayer.sol)#107
private constant MAX_SUPPLY = ~uint128(0); (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UniLayer.sol)#109
private _totalSupply; (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UniLayer.sol)#111
private _gonsPerFragment; (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UniLayer.sol)#112
private _gonBalances; (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UniLayer.sol)#113
